messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Migration Alert

Due to [REDACTED], a whoop of wire eating mammals have stampeded into the [REDACTED].

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Migration Alert

Due to budget-cuts, a horde of rodents have migrated into the maintenance tunnels.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Migration Alert

Due to climate change, a pack of squeaking things have descended into the place with all those juicy wires.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unknown biological entities have been detected near Space Station 13, please stand-by.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Migration Alert

Due to Ragnarok, a number of rodents have swarmed into the maintenance areas.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Migration Alert

Due to bad luck, a number of rodents have migrated into the place with all those juicy wires.
